titleStmt.title: By the Queene a proclamation for proceeding against Iesuites and secular priests, their receiuers, relieuers, and maintainers.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at our Manour of Richmont [sic], the fift [sic] day of Nouember, in the foure and fourtieth yeere of our Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
